Question: TrackFarm Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TrackFarm Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Introducing the latest GPS tracking device for fleet management
- Enhanced real-time tracking and monitoring capabilities
- Improved battery life for extended usage
- Integration with advanced software for comprehensive data analysis and reporting
- Enhanced durability and weather resistance for reliable performance in various conditions
Summary_cn:
TrackFarm有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 推出最新的车队管理用GPS追踪设备
- 强化实时追踪和监控能力
- 提高电池续航时间，延长使用时间
- 与先进软件集成，进行综合数据分析与报告
- 提高耐用性和天气防护性能，可在各种条件下可靠运行
